abilities.name: Psychic Guidance
abilities.rule: While this unit is within 12" of one or more friendly **AELDARI PSYKER** models, models in this unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+ and each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Malevolent Souls
abilities.rule: Each time a model in this unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 3+, do not remove it from play; that destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

abilities.name: Forceshield
abilities.rule: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear_abilities.name: Forceshield
wargear_abilities.rule: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear_options: ■ All of the models in this unit can each have their ghostswords replaced with 1 ghostaxe and 1 forceshield.
